data.message: Hi I represent an alcohol importer, we are based in NYC. And I want to know if we need any reference to FB regulations, and do we need any template text about alcohol policy, etc.? Thanks, its quite urgent for us.

replies.message: Hi Sylwia. We have commerce policies that apply not just to Marketplace, but everywhere we offer solutions to buy and sell on Facebook. Find them here: http://bit.ly/2pUQZtL. -Jessica

Thank you, but we do not sell things on FB, we have fan page as the fan pages of other alcoo/beer brands. So I asked if there is any obligatory regulation writing we need to LIST in our profile. Thank you
